sentences.sContent: We only used Morse code to keeo in touch.
sentences.sCn: 我们只是用摩尔斯密码保持联系。

sentences.sContent: The residential college system worked better on paper than it did in reality, especially for those of us who were stuck in Morse.
sentences.sCn: 住宿学院系统实际操作没有做得文件上写的那么好，尤其是对我们那些陷入摩尔斯代码研究困境的人而言。

sentences.sContent: In 1843, Morse and Vail received funding from the U.S. Congress to set up and test their telegraph system between Washington, D.C., and Baltimore, Maryland.
sentences.sCn: 在1843年，摩尔斯和威尔受美国国会资助，在华盛顿和马里兰州的巴尔的摩之间建立电报系统并进行了测试。
